p: Future climate change would greatly affect the average species turnover in NRs. Under the three RCPs, NRs with the relatively low species turnover were located in Qinghai Haibei Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, and Haixi Mongolian‚ÄêTibetan Autonomous Prefecture. The NRs with the greatest species turnover included Qinghai Nuomuhong Provincial NR, Qinghai Chaidamu Haloxylon Ammodendron Forest National NR, and some conservation subareas of Sanjiangyuan National NR (Tuanjiefeng conservation subarea, Heihe Heyuanyuan conservation subarea, Yueguzonglie conservation subarea, Sanheyuan conservation subarea, Dangqu conservation subarea, and Geladandong conservation subarea; Figures 3d 4f).
